author: Staff Reporter
text:
Advocates in Tiruvannamalai boycotted courts demanding action on a S.I. who allegedly abused an advocate at police station last week. Taluk SI Prathap Chandran allegedly abused advocate Anabzhagan while he was accompanying his party to the police station. This led to conflict.

Representatives of three advocates unions viz. Tiruvannamalai Bar Association, Lawyers Association and Advocates Association met Superintendent of Police R.Ponni and presented a representation demanding action on the SI. According to advocates union sources she promised them to enquire into the incident in four days and said DSP of District Crime Branch Ashok Kumar would enquire into the incident.

Later advocates decided to boycott courts till a solution is reached.
title: Advocates boycott court
